channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 俄罗斯现在正公然向朝鲜运送石油，完全无视联合国的制裁--@crsdavies 的精彩爆料和 @RUSI_org 通过 @ft 提供的卫星照片
item.description:
Russia is now brazenly shipping oil to North Korea in full defiance of UN sanctions - excellent scoop from @crsdavies and satellite photos from @RUSI_org https://t.co/V0noPifPNl via @ft

— Henry Foy (@HenryJFoy) March 26, 2024

item.title: "如果未来的经济史书回顾过去一周的中央银行业务，将其视为摆脱严格通胀目标的标志，我也不会感到惊讶"--@elerianm 为《金融时报》撰写的最新专栏
item.description:
"It would not surprise me if future economic history books were to look back at the last week in central banking as marking a move away from strict inflation targeting" - @elerianm's latest column for the FT https://t.co/Um7DEq7QFA

— Tony Tassell (@TonyTassell) March 26, 2024

item.title: 英国杂货通胀率降至乌克兰战争前水平
item.description:
UK grocery inflation drops to pre-Ukraine war level https://t.co/edD1P3q1pO

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在美国，"傻瓜，这不再是经济问题"。但这似乎只是美国的现象。约翰-伯恩-默多克（John Burn-Murdoch）说，在美国，经济情绪与政府受欢迎程度之间的关系已经消失，但在西欧，这种关系仍然很强。原因何在？
item.description:
In the US, “It’s no longer the economy, stupid”. But this seems a solely American phenomenon. The relationship between economic sentiment and government popularity has evaporated there but remains strong in western Europe, says John Burn-Murdoch. Why? https://t.co/3oy8pBXJdP

— FT Opinion (@ftopinion) March 22, 2024

item.title: 中央银行的转折点
item.description:
A turning point in central banking https://t.co/FcWT7CCf8q

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024

item.title: 自联合国于 2017 年针对平壤的核武器试验对石油运输实施严格限制以来，至少有五艘油轮在 3 月份进行了运输，这是首次有记录的从俄罗斯直接进行的海运。
item.description:
At least five tankers made shipments in March, in the first documented direct seaborne deliveries from Russia since the UN imposed a strict cap on oil transfers in 2017 in response to Pyongyang’s nuclear weapons tests https://t.co/mL3g4XxDw1 pic.twitter.com/xEnrMhctaV

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024

item.title: 英国《金融时报》独家报道：美国国会独立财政监督机构负责人警告说，美国债务正处于 "史无前例 "的轨道上，可能会导致李斯-特鲁斯式的市场震荡
item.description:
FT Exclusive: US debt is on an 'unprecedented' trajectory that could lead to a Liz Truss-style market shock, the head of Congress’s independent fiscal watchdog has warned https://t.co/JLiKKeQE9z pic.twitter.com/ljX3OpInL1

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024

item.title: 印度 9.68 亿合格选民将在六周内投票。反对党称这一漫长的选举过程有利于纳伦德拉-莫迪，@JohnReedwrites 写道
item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024

item.title: 英国《金融时报》编辑部撰文指出，俄罗斯正在哀悼上周五摇滚音乐会恐怖袭击事件中至少137人的死亡，其中包括几名儿童。
item.description:
Russia is mourning the deaths of at least 137 people, including several children, in last Friday’s horrific terrorist attack on a rock concert, writes the FT editorial board https://t.co/eb2VpumtEx pic.twitter.com/CfA3uDS7fM

— Financial Times (@FT) March 25, 2024

item.title: 美国国家安全委员会发言人说，美国投了弃权票，因为决议没有明确谴责哈马斯

item.title: 美国起诉书指控该组织向联邦政府官员发送了 1 万多封带有隐藏跟踪链接的 "恶意 "电子邮件
item.description:
The US indictment alleges that the group sent more than 10,000 ‘malicious’ emails with hidden tracking links to officials across the federal government https://t.co/029zS4AWmR pic.twitter.com/LH3WHq0lGD

— Financial Times (@FT) March 25, 2024
